text: Yuriy Avanesov (; 16 August 1935 – 19 August 2012) is a former professional Soviet football and coach. ==References == ==External links== * Category:1935 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Baku Category:Soviet footballers Category:Soviet football managers Category:Ukrainian football managers Category:FC Volyn Lutsk managers Category:FC Podillya Khmelnytskyi managers Category:FC Spartak Ivano-Frankivsk managers Category:FC Nyva Vinnytsia managers Category:Association footballers not categorized by position
title: Yuriy Avanesov
